page.title: 06GOING TO WORK 1
page.content: Andrew Hurst and Patrick Juggins went round{Eye Church of England {School}asking "What's your dad's job?"Here are the replies: 21 dads work at Perkins. 20 dads work in Offices. 20 others (include: plumber, decorator , farmers, electricians, fireman, policeman, carpenter, teacher, printers and social worker.) 16 engineers 14 self employed 13 builders includes men who work at brickyards 10 drivers (lorry, bus, taxi) 7 mechanics 6 factory workers 5 Baker Perkins 2 Odams mill 1 Derek Crouch 1 Shop worker
